article_title: Two Men Recovering After 75 Foot Fall Into Cottonwood Creek
article_text:
Two men are at a local hospital after a 75 foot fall.

It happened near Academy and Woodmen next to Cottonwood Creek.

It's still unclear how the fall happened but the men were on a steep cliff and fell into the creek.

A witness saw it all happen and called police.

Firefighters say both men have serious injuries from the fall.

A new trail was added in the area recently and rescue crews tell 11 News this isn’t the first time this has happened.

Firefighters want to remind people in the area to use caution when they are near the creek.
